topic: Rendering with Radiance coming back soon... (was: Luminance to RGB)
body:
Great news, thank you for giving back that great source of Radiance 
wisdom to the community!!!!


> Of course, we've promised this sort of thing before, but this time it looks like it's really going to happen.


Would you please correctly reference me if you quote me like that on a 
public mailing list!? ;-))))))
___
